sys_properties.description: text that will show on the popup to users when they've been inactive for a certain period of time. This text should tell them that they need to click ok to prevent their session from expiring and that if their session expires they can lose their work. Include the tag ${expiration-timestamp} to display when the user's session will expire in their local time.
sys_properties.name: x_58872_needit.glide.ui.session_timeout_dialog_text
sys_properties.value: POPUP : Your session is about to end due to inactivity. Click OK to continue this session. If you click Cancel or take no action your session will automatically expire at ${expiration-timestamp}.
